introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is さいじつ which you will often hear when talking about official holidays, festivals, or looking at a calendar in Japan.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "sai jitsu" means a public holiday or festival day in Japanese. It's a day when most people are off from work, and there are often celebrations or cultural events. In Japan, festivals are called matsuri, and they have various forms depending on the region and season. But "sai jitsu" specifically refers to official holidays recognized by the government.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 休日 : きゅうじつ : holiday
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word さいじつ are きゅうじつ and やすみ. きゅうじつ usually refers to any day off, not specifically tied to a festival, while やすみ is a more general term for rest or holiday, which could refer to a personal day off rather than a national holiday.
antonyms: 平日 : へいじつ : weekday
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word さいじつ are へいじつ and きんむび. へいじつ refers to a regular weekday when people typically work, in contrast to a holiday. きんむび is a working day, emphasizing the presence of work duties and responsibilities, distinguishing it from a day off or a festival day.

example_sentences.furigana: 祭日(さいじつ)は休み(やすみ)です。

translations.EN: It is a holiday on a festival day.
translations.ID: Pada hari raya adalah hari libur.
translations.ES: Es un día de descanso en un día de fiesta.
translations.VI: Ngày lễ hội là ngày nghỉ.
translations.FR: C'est un jour férié lors d'un festival.
translations.TL: Araw ng pista ay walang pasok.
translations.MY: ပွဲတော်ရက်မှာ အနားရက်ပါ။

example_sentences.furigana: 祭日(さいじつ)は休み(やすみ)です。

translations.ES: Los días festivos son días de descanso.
translations.FR: Les jours fériés sont des jours de congé.
translations.TL: Ang mga pista ay mga araw na walang pasok.
translations.MY: ပွဲတော်ရက်တွေက အနားရက်တွေနဲ့တူတယ်။
translations.HI: त्यौहार के दिन छुट्टी होती है।

example_sentences.furigana: 明日(あした)は祭日(さいじつ)です。

translations.VI: Ngày mai là ngày nghỉ lễ.
translations.MY: မနက်ဖြန်မှာ အားလပ်ရက်ပါ။

example_sentences.kanji: 国民的な祭日は休みです。
example_sentences.furigana: 国民(こくみん)的(てき)な祭日(さいじつ)は休(やす)みです。

translations.ID: Hari libur nasional adalah hari libur.
translations.ES: Los días festivos nacionales son días festivos.
translations.VI: Ngày lễ quốc dân là ngày nghỉ.
translations.FR: Les jours fériés nationaux sont des jours de repos.
translations.TL: Ang pambansang pista ay isang pista.
translations.MY: အမျိုးသားနေ့ထိုင်သည် နေ့ခင်းဖြစ်သည်။

parts_of_speech: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
